N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2394.8 - Burden of proof

State Regulations
(a) In a
hearing pursuant to this Part involving the issue of whether the issuance of a
warrant is reasonable under the circumstances, the burden of proof in respect
to such issue shall be upon the department. (b) In a hearing pursuant to this Part
involving the issue of whether the amount so warranted is appropriate under the
circumstances, the department shall provide a written statement which contains
any information with respect to which the determination of the amount of the
warrant was based, but the burden of proof in respect to the issue of the
appropriateness of such amount shall be upon the applicant. Notes
